page_components.title: The all-rounder you never knew you needed.

columnContent.colDescription: Speaking to 5 customers a day feeling a bit distant now? I can help you maintain customer engagement - to understand their behaviours and challenge and translate them into actionable insights

Are you at the crossroads...of needing defined processes but wanting the speed of having none? I love organisation, but also a strong affection for efficiency - so I can help you build just enough structure to gain consistency, but not too much to hinder agility
Product vision clear as day - but technical architecture not as much? I am a software developer by trade, who works in business - providing you with a bridge between commerce and code

Need help on a combination of things? Need skills that you don’t see on this doc? 

Get in touch, and let’s discuss how we can work together.
